TEXT.TITLE: <MDI MOBILE DATA INTERNATIONAL INC> YEAR NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr 63 cts vs 47 cts Oper shr diluted 56 cts vs 38 cts Oper net 3,284,955 vs 2,176,925 Revs 31.6 mln vs 23.0 mln NOTE: Current oper net excludes writedown of 344,039 dlrs, or seven cts a share, on unidentified investment. Reuter
